description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党员，中华人民共和国水利和水电专家及政治人物，原国家级副职领导人。曾任中共第十至第十四届中央委员，第七、八、九届全国政协副主席，中华人民共和国水利部及水利电力部部长，第六届中国红十字会会长。
description.en: A member of the Communist Party of China, an expert in water conservancy and hydropower, and a political figure in the People's Republic of China. She was a former national-level deputy leader, having served as a member of the 10th to 14th Central Committees of the CCP, Vice Chairperson of the 7th, 8th, and 9th National Committees of the CPPCC, Minister of Water Resources and Minister of Water Resources and Electric Power, and the 6th President of the Red Cross Society of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，钱正英的丈夫，曾任中华人民共和国教育部副部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, husband of Qian Zhengying, and former Vice Minister of the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于上海的私立大学，1952年院系调整时被撤销。
description.en: A former private university in Shanghai, which was dissolved in the 1952 higher education reorganization.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的主要河流之一。
description.en: A major river in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央人民政府内政部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Minister of Internal Affairs of the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的大区级军政领导机构。
description.en: A regional military and political leadership body in the early days of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国水利部 (1949年—1954年)

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国水利部 (1949年—1954年)

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府政务院的组成部门之一。
description.en: One of the constituent departments of the Government Administration Council of the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年间中华人民共和国发生的一场重大政治运动。
description.en: A major political movement in the People's Republic of China from 1966 to 1976.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国水利电力部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国水利电力部

description.zh-cn: 曾主管中国水利和电力工业的中华人民共和国国务院组成部门。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, which was in charge of the country's water conservancy and electric power industries.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事家、政治家，曾任中华人民共和国水利部、水利电力部部长。
description.en: Chinese military strategist and politician, who served as Minister of Water Resources and Minister of Water Resources and Electric Power of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国水利部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国水利部

description.zh-cn: 主管中国水利事务的中华人民共和国国务院组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for water conservancy affairs.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国性组织。
description.en: The national organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 对中华人民共和国政治和军事拥有最高领导权或重要影响力的一批人士的统称。
description.en: A collective term for a group of individuals who hold the highest leadership or significant influence over the political and military affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国统一的红十字组织，是从事人道主义工作的社会救助团体。
description.en: The unified Red Cross organization of the People's Republic of China, a social relief group engaged in humanitarian work.

description.zh-cn: 1918年至1992年间存在的中欧国家。
description.en: A Central European country that existed from 1918 to 1992.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国工程科学技术界的最高荣誉性、咨询性学术机构。
description.en: The highest honorary and advisory academic institution in the field of engineering science and technology in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于香港的公立研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university located in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国长江上的水利枢纽工程。
description.en: A hydroelectric gravity dam that spans the Yangtze River in China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国关于水资源管理和保护的法律。
description.en: A law of the People's Republic of China concerning the management and protection of water resources.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国水土保持法

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国水土保持法

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国关于水土保持的法律。
description.en: A law of the People's Republic of China concerning soil and water conservation.

description.zh-cn: 由中国大百科全书出版社出版的中文综合性百科全书。
description.en: A comprehensive Chinese-language encyclopedia published by the Encyclopedia of China Publishing House.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国教育部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部

description.zh-cn: 主管中国教育事业的中华人民共和国国务院组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China that oversees the country's education sector.

description.zh-cn: 清代大臣，钱正英的祖先。
description.en: An official of the Qing dynasty and an ancestor of Qian Zhengying.

description.zh-cn: 清代大臣，钱正英的祖先。
description.en: An official of the Qing dynasty and an ancestor of Qian Zhengying.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央权力机关。
description.en: The central authority of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国主席、全国政协主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as President of the People's Republic of China and Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任全国政协主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中国共产党中央委员会主席、中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任全国政协主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国上海历史上曾有的一个县。
description.en: A former county in the history of Shanghai, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 钱正英与黄辛白是夫妻关系。
description.en: Qian Zhengying and Huang Xinbai were married.

description.zh-cn: 钱正英于1939年进入上海大同大学土木工程系学习，后肄业。
description.en: Qian Zhengying entered the Department of Civil Engineering at Shanghai Datong University in 1939 but did not graduate.

description.zh-cn: 钱正英于1941年9月参加了上海中共地下党组织。
description.en: Qian Zhengying joined the underground organization of the CCP in Shanghai in September 1941.

description.zh-cn: 1944年春，21岁的钱正英负责淮河北堤修复工程的技术领导工作，并长期主持淮河等流域的治理和规划。
description.en: In the spring of 1944, 21-year-old Qian Zhengying was responsible for the technical leadership of the restoration project of the north embankment of the Huai River, and later oversaw the governance and planning of basins including the Huai River for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 1950年3月，经中央人民政府内政部部长曾山的推荐，钱正英被任命为华东军政委员会水利部副部长。
description.en: In March 1950, upon the recommendation of Zeng Shan, Minister of Internal Affairs of the Central People's Government, Qian Zhengying was appointed as the Vice Minister of the Ministry of Water Conservancy of the East China Military and Political Committee.

position.en: Vice Minister of the Ministry of Water Conservancy

description.zh-cn: 钱正英曾任华东军政委员会水利部副部长兼治淮委员会工程部副部长。
description.en: Qian Zhengying served as Vice Minister of the Ministry of Water Conservancy of the East China Military and Political Committee and concurrently as Vice Minister of the Engineering Department of the Huai River Harnessing Commission.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国水利部 (1949年—1954年)

description.zh-cn: 1952年，钱正英转任中央人民政府水利部副部长。
description.en: In 1952, Qian Zhengying was transferred to the position of Vice Minister of the Ministry of Water Conservancy of the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 在1967年至1970年的“文化大革命”期间，钱正英受到冲击。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution from 1967 to 1970, Qian Zhengying was persecuted.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国水利电力部

position.zh-cn: 副部长、革委会副主任、部长
position.en: Vice Minister, Vice Director of the Revolutionary Committee, Minister

description.zh-cn: 钱正英在水利电力部担任过多个职务，包括副部长、革委会副主任以及两度出任部长。
description.en: Qian Zhengying held multiple positions in the Ministry of Water Resources and Electric Power, including Vice Minister, Vice Director of the Revolutionary Committee, and served as Minister twice.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国水利部

description.zh-cn: 钱正英在水利部长期任职，曾任副部长和部长。
description.en: Qian Zhengying had a long tenure at the Ministry of Water Resources, serving as both Vice Minister and Minister.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 钱正英曾任第七、八、九届全国政协副主席。
description.en: Qian Zhengying served as the Vice Chairperson of the 7th, 8th, and 9th National Committees of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 钱正英在1988年当选为全国政协副主席后，位列“党和国家领导人”。
description.en: After being elected as Vice Chairperson of the CPPCC National Committee in 1988, Qian Zhengying was ranked among the 'Party and State Leaders'.

description.zh-cn: 钱正英曾兼任第六届中国红十字会会长。
description.en: Qian Zhengying concurrently served as the 6th President of the Red Cross Society of China.

description.zh-cn: 捷克斯洛伐克于1989年11月1日向钱正英颁发了“友谊勋章”。
description.en: On November 1, 1989, Czechoslovakia awarded the 'Order of Friendship' to Qian Zhengying.

description.zh-cn: 钱正英于1997年当选为中国工程院院士。
description.en: Qian Zhengying was elected as an academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering in 1997.

description.zh-cn: 2004年3月，钱正英获得香港大学名誉科学博士学位。
description.en: In March 2004, Qian Zhengying was awarded an Honorary Doctor of Science degree by the University of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 钱正英逝世后，时任全国政协主席汪洋受中共中央委托前往八宝山革命公墓为其送别。
description.en: After Qian Zhengying's death, then-Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee Wang Yang, entrusted by the CCP Central Committee, went to the Babaoshan Revolutionary Cemetery to bid her farewell.

description.zh-cn: 钱正英主持领导了“三峡工程”的可行性论证工作。
description.en: Qian Zhengying presided over and led the feasibility study for the Three Gorges Project.

description.zh-cn: 钱正英主持完成了《中华人民共和国水法》的起草工作。
description.en: Qian Zhengying presided over the completion of the drafting work for the 'Water Law of the People's Republic of China'.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国水土保持法

description.zh-cn: 钱正英主持完成了《中华人民共和国水土保持法》的起草工作。
description.en: Qian Zhengying presided over the completion of the drafting work for the 'Law of the People's Republic of China on Water and Soil Conservation'.

description.zh-cn: 钱正英主编出版了《中国大百科全书·水利卷》。
description.en: Qian Zhengying served as the editor-in-chief for the publication of the 'Water Conservancy Volume' of the Encyclopedia of China.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国教育部

description.zh-cn: 钱正英的丈夫黄辛白曾任中华人民共和国教育部副部长。
description.en: Qian Zhengying's husband, Huang Xinbai, served as the Vice Minister of the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 钱正英是清代大臣钱陈群的后代。
description.en: Qian Zhengying is a descendant of Qian Chenqun, an official of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 钱正英是清代大臣钱应溥的后代。
description.en: Qian Zhengying is a descendant of Qian Yingpu, an official of the Qing dynasty.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 钱正英是中国共产党第十届至第十四届中央委员会委员。
description.en: Qian Zhengying was a member of the 10th to 14th Central Committees of the Communist Party of China.

position.en: Vice Chairperson of the CPPCC National Committee

description.zh-cn: 钱正英担任全国政协副主席期间，李先念是时任全国政协主席。
description.en: While Qian Zhengying served as Vice Chairperson of the CPPCC National Committee, Li Xiannian was the serving Chairman.

position.en: Vice Chairperson of the CPPCC National Committee

description.zh-cn: 钱正英担任全国政协副主席期间，李瑞环是时任全国政协主席。
description.en: While Qian Zhengying served as Vice Chairperson of the CPPCC National Committee, Li Ruihuan was the serving Chairman.

position.zh-cn: 水利电力部/水利部部长
position.en: Minister of Water Resources and Electric Power / Minister of Water Resources

description.zh-cn: 钱正英担任部长期间，华国锋是时任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: While Qian Zhengying served as a minister, Hua Guofeng was the serving Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

position.zh-cn: 水利部/水利电力部部长
position.en: Minister of Water Resources / Minister of Water Resources and Electric Power

description.zh-cn: 钱正英担任部长期间，赵紫阳是时任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: While Qian Zhengying served as a minister, Zhao Ziyang was the serving Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

position.en: Minister of Water Resources and Electric Power

description.zh-cn: 钱正英担任水利电力部部长期间，李鹏是时任中华人民共和国国务院代总理及总理。
description.en: While Qian Zhengying served as Minister of Water Resources and Electric Power, Li Peng was the serving Acting Premier and Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.
